channel.title: Starting Equipment
channel.description:
Ok, so i started off making my own source by using DefaultScape which is a source with hardly anything in it.
Anyways, i wanted to know how to change what you have in your inventory and what you equip when you make a new account.
If anyone could help me that'd be great

item.title: Starting Equipment
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

First, go into Player.Java
Then press Ctrl + F.
Search for “Unique”
You should see an area that is the starting equipment, and just change those.

Read full topic
